thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: Louis Persson
thread.title_full: Bolt Depot reviewed by Louis Persson

author: Louis Persson
title: Louis Persson
text:
I enjoy dealing with bolt depot. Their website sorts thousands of nuts, bolts and washers into a logical arrangement that is easy to work through. The precise dimension data is a great help.
My most recent purchase was eye bolts. Their working load data showed me that it made a lot of sense to go from 5/16" (which I had planned on) up to 3/8". I got a huge increase in strength at a very modest increase in cost.
I, also, appreciate that I can get a price break without buying huge quantities of an item.
This is, definitely, the way to buy bolts.
